articles.title: Incomplete Section Example
articles.abstract: This article demonstrates how empty sections are hidden. Only Introduction and Conclusion are provided.
articles.introduction: This is the only main content section provided aside from abstract and conclusion.
articles.conclusion: As you can see, methods, results, and discussion sections are hidden.
